algorithm
Class StringWorks

java.lang.Object
  algorithm.StringWorks

public class StringWorks
extends java.lang.Object

This class only exists to work with signatures inside the QMC-Algortihm. Perhabs it replaced at some state of the developement. The aim is to organize the QMC algorithm to start at XXXX continuing on -XXXX,X-XXX,XX-XX,XXX-X ... ... until ----X,---X-,--X--,-X---,X---- and finally ----- in the case of monom lenth 5.

Author:
chrissy
